Data: Angelo Mathews to Hussey, FOUR runs short and Hussey cashes in, gets on the back foot and slaps it hard past midwicket, dragged it from outside off, struck it really well
Angelo Mathews to Hussey, 1 run shortish outside off, punched away towards extra cover from the crease into the deep
Angelo Mathews to Maxwell, no run beaten, caught walking on that one as he tried to defend, moved away off the pitch to just go past the outside edge
Angelo Mathews to Maxwell, no run angling in towards off and middle, opens the face as he defends that one to point
Angelo Mathews to Maxwell, no run angling in towards middle, gets front and across and defends it to cover
Angelo Mathews to Maxwell, no run back of a length on middle, just knocks that one down into the leg side towards midwicket
Perera to Hussey, no run short of a good length and it's punched towards extra cover off the front foot
Perera to Hussey, FOUR runs Hussey attacks, pitched up outside off and he creams that uppishly, but safely, through extra cover and mid-off
Perera to Hussey, no run short of a length, has a chance to free his arms there and cuts it towards point
Perera to Hussey, no run thrashed, but straight to Dilshan at point, short and wide and he went hard at that one but couldn't get it past Dilshan
Perera to Hussey, no run in the channel outside off and he lets that one go as it holds its line
Perera to Hussey, no run shortish outside off and he has nothing to do with that one, leaves it be
Angelo Mathews to Maxwell, no run angling in towards middle, rocks on the back foot and defends it to mid-on
Angelo Mathews to Maxwell, no run goodish length outside off and Maxwell strikes that to cover off the front foot
Angelo Mathews to Maxwell, no run goes for the pull, short of a length and the shot was on, tried to go over square leg and missed
Angelo Mathews to Maxwell, no run short of a good length, gets on the back foot and defends it to cover
Angelo Mathews to Maxwell, no run beaten, Maxwell's a little iffy here, Angelo pushes it on a length and gets it to deviate away from the batsman, Maxwell goes for the drive and misses
Angelo Mathews to Maxwell, 2 runs slightly short outside off, opened the face slightly there, a bit of an edge wide of third man and they come back for the second
Mendis to Hussey, FOUR runs turns away, a short legspinner and Hussey doesn't spare it, short and wide, moves away and cuts it well through point
Mendis to Hussey, 1 wide slides that one down the leg side and it's called a wide, goes straight on, no spin there
Mendis to Hussey, no run floating it on middle and it's pushed straight to midwicket
Mendis to Hussey, 1 run shortish outside off, punched towards deep extra cover for a single
Mendis to Maxwell, 3 runs tickles that one really fine, lands on leg stump and he turned the face on that one, picked up three runs

Mendis to Hussey, OUT run-out, turns it into the leg side just a little square of midwicket, Dilshan is the man there, he moved to his right, slid, collected it and threw down the stumps at the non-striker's end, Mendis thought of collecting the throw initially but decided to let it be in the end as it was on its way to the stumps, Hussey is gone, this is a huge b
Mendis to Maxwell, 1 run short on middle, turns in and he punches it past midwicket for a single

Angelo Mathews to Maxwell, OUT Six down! Mathews strikes, lovely delivery, just outside off stump, drew the batsman forward with a good length and got it to nip away just a touch, Maxwell was committed to the drive as he walked forward, got a thin edge and Perera made no mistake behind the stumps
Angelo Mathews to Cutting, no run short of a good length outside off, drops that towards cover
Angelo Mathews to Cutting, no run goodish length outside off, stretches forward and defends him to cover
Angelo Mathews to Cutting, no run slides that one away from the off stump and gets it to move away, leaves that one alone to the keeper
Angelo Mathews to Cutting, no run angling in towards the off stump, strides forward and drops it into the off side

Angelo Mathews to Cutting, no run beaten, almost another Maxwell there, slight deviation away from the batsman off the pitch again, the only difference this time is Cutting, who was also caught walking, didn't get an outside edge
Mendis to Haddin, 1 run floating it on middle, drives it down the ground towards long-on for a single
Mendis to Cutting, no run comes down the pitch to that delivery and plays it to midwicket
Mendis to Cutting, 1 run flighted on middle, pushed down to long-on for one, Cutting is off the mark in international cricket
Mendis to Haddin, FOUR runs poor ball, full toss outside off and Haddin cracks that through extra cover and mid-off for a welcome boundary
Mendis to Haddin, no run flatter on middle and off this time, reaches forward and plays it to the bowler
Mendis to Haddin, no run slides it straight on middle and plays it down the track
Angelo Mathews to Cutting, no run short of a good length outside off, drops it down into the off side
Angelo Mathews to Cutting, 1 run
Angelo Mathews to Haddin, no run shortish on the off, rocks on the back foot and defends into the off side
Angelo Mathews to Haddin, no run angling in towards middle, plays it from the crease into the off side now
Angelo Mathews to Haddin, no run angling in towards middle, head down and solidly defended towards cover
Angelo Mathews to Haddin, no run in the channel and holds its line, Haddin lets that one go
Mendis to Cutting, no run in the channel outside off, turns away and he leaves that one alone
Mendis to Cutting, no run angling in towards middle, rocks forward and defends it back to the bowler
Mendis to Cutting, 1 run flighted on middle, steps out of the crease and drives it to long-on
Mendis to Haddin, no run goodish length outside off, reaches for it and stabs it to cover
Mendis to Haddin, no run floating it straight on the off, steps forward and defends it to the bowler
Mendis to Haddin, no run on a length and it's driven straight to extra cover
Malinga to Cutting, no run in the channel outside off stump, moving away and he lets that one go
Malinga to Cutting, no run fullish outside off and that's guided towards point from the crease
Malinga to Cutting, 1 run slightly short outside off, guides that one down to third man for a single
Malinga to Haddin, no run bowled it on a good length on middle, slightly cramped there, defended towards cover from the crease
Malinga to Haddin, no run beaten, short of a good length and slightly movement away from the right hander, Haddin flirts with it and is beaten
Malinga to Haddin, 1 run shortish outside off and it's guided down to third man for a single to keep strike
Mendis to Haddin, no run length ball angled in, played to short leg
Mendis to Haddin, no run drives a pitched up delivery out to wide mid off

Mendis to Haddin, 1 bye what a beauty, tossed up, lured Haddin forward for a defensive push, batsman leaves a massive gap between and pad, the ball spins in and bounces, somehow contrives to miss the stumps
Mendis to Cutting, no run fullish, pushed out to the off side
Mendis to Cutting, FOUR runs Cutting gets the boundary now, Mendis going wide outside off with an overpitched one, and Cutting flays it through covers
Mendis to Cutting, no run defended off the front foot
Malinga to Haddin, no run short of a length from Malinga and Haddin mistimes one as he plays it towards point
Malinga to Haddin, no run beaten, lands around off stump and sneaks past the outside edge after moving away, nicely done
Malinga to Haddin, no run short of a good length on the off, gets on the back foot and taps it towards cover

Malinga to Haddin, FOUR runs slides on the pads and Haddin just helps it along through square leg, big gap in that area and they take three runs, that's four, good attempt in the deep but his hand was in contact with the ropes as he reached the ball, 100 up for Australia
Malinga to Haddin, no run beaten once more, nips away from a good length and just goes past the outside edge
Mendis to Cutting, no run bowls that one full on the off and pushes it towards mid-off
Mendis to Cutting, 1 run tossed up on middle, drives it towards midwicket where there's a fumble and they get a single
Mendis to Haddin, no run slightly short on the off, he gets back and defends it into the leg side
Mendis to Haddin, 1 run shortish on middle, turns it square for a comfortable single
Mendis to Cutting, 1 run turns in from outside off, chops that wide of cover for a quick single
Mendis to Haddin, no run quicker one on middle and leg, pushes it towards midwicket from the crease
Jeevan Mendis to Cutting, no run flighted on middle, gets forward to the pitch and defends that one
Jeevan Mendis to Cutting, 1 run drives that one down to long-on for a single
Jeevan Mendis to Haddin, no run lobbed up into the leg side after a leading edge, floated on leg stump and turned towards middle...
Jeevan Mendis to Haddin, no run gets forward and across and defends that one towards midwicket
Jeevan Mendis to Haddin, 1 run shortish on middle, gets on the back foot and turns it past midwicket for a single
Jeevan Mendis to Cutting, 1 run tossed up outside off, reaches forward to defend, gets a thick inside edge and it rolls down towards square leg
Mendis to Cutting, no run bowled that one flat on the off stump, defends it back towards the bowler
Mendis to Cutting, no run comes down the track and pushes it back down the pitch
Mendis to Cutting, no run on a good length on the off and holds its line, taps it into the off side
Mendis to Cutting, FOUR runs short on middle and there's a yawning gap behind square leg, pulled away with ease for a boundary
Mendis to Cutting, 2 runs shortish outside off, chops that one behind point for a single
Mendis to Cutting, no run in the channel outside off, turns away and he leaves that one be
Jeevan Mendis to Haddin, no run turns it into the leg side
Jeevan Mendis to Haddin, no run gets forward and turns it towards midwicket
Jeevan Mendis to Haddin, 1 run drives that one down towards long-off for a single
Jeevan Mendis to Cutting, 1 run tossed up on middle, clipped through midwicket into the deep for a single
Jeevan Mendis to Haddin, 1 run quicker through the air from Jeevan, drives it firmly down the ground past the diving bowler for a single
Jeevan Mendis to Cutting, 1 run flighted on middle and he picks a single to long-on
Mendis to Cutting, no run closer on middle and off and that's been pushed into the off side
Mendis to Cutting, 1 run sliced through point this time for a single
Mendis to Haddin, 2 runs edged, the legspinner, bowled outside off and he reached for it, got a thick edge behind point for a couple of runs
Mendis to Haddin, 3 runs flatter outside off, cracked hard off the front foot in front of cover into the deep for three runs, Kulasekara saves a run diving to his right
Mendis to Cutting, no run goodish length on middle and off, defended back to the bowler
Mendis to Cutting, 1 run shortish on middle, the offspinner this time, mistimes a pull, a thick inside edge wide of short fine leg
Kulasekara to Cutting, no run goodish length on the off, gets forward and defends it towards cover
Kulasekara to Cutting, 2 runs a jab more than a pull but very well timed, short and he gets it wide of midwicket but there is protection in the deep there, a couple more
Kulasekara to Cutting, no run a full delivery outside off and he tried to steer that behind point, missed
Kulasekara to Cutting, no run shortish outside off, chops it towards cover, no single on offer there
Kulasekara to Cutting, 1 run low full toss, comes down the track and drives it wide of deep cover for a single
Kulasekara to Haddin, 1 run short of a length outside off and that's eased through point and cover for a single
Malinga to Haddin, 1 run slower one on middle and it's pushed into the leg side for a single

Malinga to Cutting, OUT gone! Malinga strikes, Perera takes his third catch, pitched up outside off and Cutting tries to drive it through cover, gets a thick edge and Perera dives to his right to snap that one

Malinga to Kane Richardson, OUT Oh dear, a first baller on debut, a deceptive slower one from Malinga, Richardson didn't spot it, it died low on the batsman and Richardson missed it to be struck low on the pad, perhaps just in line with leg stump, he's got to go
Malinga to McKay, no run solid defensive, goodish length and he stylishly played it towards extra cover
Malinga to McKay, no run another slower one from Malinga, pushes it straight to midwicket
Malinga to McKay, no run gets across and presses that one away, Australia slid further in that Powerplay
Angelo Mathews to Haddin, 1 run short of a good length on middle, gets on the back foot and drops it into the leg side to get a single
Angelo Mathews to McKay, no run shortish on middle and leg, struck high on the pads as he tries to turn it into the leg side
Angelo Mathews to McKay, 2 runs short and it's slapped off the back foot wide of deep cover for a couple of runs
Angelo Mathews to McKay, no run goodish length on the off and it's pushed straight to extra cover
Angelo Mathews to McKay, no run slightly short on the off, rocks back and punches that one to cover
Angelo Mathews to McKay, no run short of a good length on the off, rocks back and pushes that to extra cover
Perera to Haddin, no run slightly short on middle, gets on the back foot and plays it back to the bowler
Perera to Haddin, 1 run shortish outside off, guides that one towards third man for a single
Perera to McKay, no run angling in towards middle, gets on the back foot and pushes it down the pitch
Perera to McKay, 2 runs ooh, goodish length and he skies that one, makes room and lofts it high, Tharanga moves back and runs back and dives, but it evades him

Perera to McKay, OUT appeal for a catch, short of a good length outside off, tries to open the face there to play it past point, it's given not out but the Sri Lankans have reviewed it, Hot Spot shows no heat signature, the umpire is taking his time to decide this, no real sound in live motion, the appeal was spontaneous but no strong technical evidence there of a
Perera to Doherty, no run goodish length on middle, gets across and defends it into the off side
Kulasekara to Haddin, 2 runs slower one bowled outside off, Haddin moves away and lofts it over mid-off for a few runs
Kulasekara to Haddin, 1 run pitched up on middle, drives it down to long-on for a single
Kulasekara to Doherty, no run bowled on a length outside off, drives it down towards mid-off from the crease
Kulasekara to Doherty, no run short of a good length outside off, nips away and he flirts with that one, beaten
Kulasekara to Doherty, no run straight on middle and it's pushed back to the bowler
Kulasekara to Doherty, no run steps forward and taps that towards cover

Perera to Haddin, SIX runs Haddin swings it into the stands, a one-handed catch in the crowd, length ball outside off and he smashes that one off a length into the crowd, a lad dressed in grew, holding a milk can in the other hand, nochalantly just snapped it with his left hand
Perera to Haddin, no run cracked it off the front foot towards extra cover, couldn't get it through
Perera to Haddin, 1 run slower one bowled outside off, guided towards short third for a single
Perera to Doherty, 1 run goodish length and it's eased through the covers into the deep for a single
Perera to Haddin, 1 run slower one outside off and it's cracked towards extra cover, mistimed again
Perera to Doherty, no run gets on the back foot and defends that one into the off side
Malinga to Cutting, no run short of a good length on middle, gets on the back foot and knocks it down in front of mid-on
Malinga to Cutting, 1 run a touch too straight from Malinga there, it's clipped square, fine leg is up, but Thirimanne does a good job in the deep to keep them to a single
Malinga to Haddin, no run goodish length on the off and he pushes that firmly back to the bowler
Malinga to Haddin, no run short of a good length on the off, Haddin rocks back and defends that one to extra cover
Malinga to Haddin, no run slightly short on the off, rocks back, takes his bottom hand off as he drops it into the off side
Malinga to Haddin, no run slower one this time from Malinga, full on middle and it's played back cautiously by Haddin
Perera to Cutting, 1 run short of a length outside off, cut away towards third man for a single
Perera to Haddin, no run short of a good length, moves way a little and pushes that towards point
Perera to Haddin, no run tries to be expansive, made a bit of room and tried to blast that through the off side but mistimed it back to the bowler
Perera to Haddin, no run short of a good length on the off, rocks back and drops it towards cover

Perera to Haddin, 2 runs Haddin isn't middling them, this one's an example, short and wide, made room to cut that over point, got a thick outside edge instead, got it wide of third man for a couple of runs
Perera to Haddin, FOUR runs middles this one all right, in the zone for Haddin, that landed full and he smashed it over mid-on for a boundary
Malinga to Haddin, no run slower one bowled on a length on the off and it's pushed back to the bowler
Malinga to Haddin, no run slightly short outside off and it's chopped down towards point
Malinga to Haddin, no run bowled that one straight on middle and he's pushed it back down the pitch now
Malinga to Haddin, no run full and wide and it's sliced towards deep point, Haddin doesn't take the single
Malinga to Haddin, no run pushes that one into the off side
Malinga to Haddin, 1 run slower one outside off, steals a single dropping that one in front of point to keep strike for the next over
Kulasekara to Haddin, 1 run full toss outside off, a low full toss, drives it wide of extra cover for a single
Kulasekara to Doherty, 1 run a fumble at mid-off after Doherty called for a single, pushed it past the bowler and raced off
Kulasekara to Haddin, no run Haddin made some room and Kulasekara chased him, Haddin dug that one out back to the bowler

Kulasekara to Haddin, FOUR runs streaky but he'll take it, full outside outside off, more width on this time, Haddin moved away to crack that through point, got a thick edge wide of the diving keeper for a boundary
Kulasekara to Haddin, 1 run low full toss on middle, drives that to long-on for a single
Kulasekara to Doherty, no run short of a length outside off and that one has been left alone
Mendis to Haddin, 1 run Fifty for Haddin, who punches that through cover for a single, good comeback for the man, has played well under pressure here for Australia
Mendis to Doherty, no run gets outside the line does Doherty and plays that back to the bowler
Mendis to Doherty, no run slightly short on the off, gets on the back foot and plays it back to the bowler
Mendis to Doherty, 3 runs gets across and turns it fine for a couple of runs, Malinga runs across, in fact it's three for Doherty who just clipped that fine
Mendis to Haddin, OUT Haddin holes out, found deep midwicket, pitched on a length and he sensed a chance, swung it hard but flat and straight to Thirimanne in the deep

Sri Lanka have an excellent chance of levelling this series now. Australia have been bowled out for a sub-par score, even on a track and in conditions that have favoured bowlers a bit more. Haddin's done a good job but his side has been bowled out with 19 balls to spare in the first innings. A collective bowling display from the visitors. Join us at around 6.30pm for the
Hello all, we are ready for the chase now. Tharanga and Dilshan are out in the middle. The target is just 171. Bright sunshine in Adelaide. We start with two slips. McKay is the bowler.
McKay to Upul Tharanga, no run goodish length on middle, gets on the back foot and defends it into the off side
McKay to Upul Tharanga, no run in the channel outside off stump, gets forward and leaves that one alone through to the keeper
McKay to Thirimanne, no run bowls that one in the channel outside off and he sees it through to the keeper
McKay to Thirimanne, 1 run slightly short outside off, cut hard through point, uppish but wide of point and he gets the single
McKay to Dilshan, no run slightly short on the off, gets on the back foot and punches it to cover
Kane Richardson to Thirimanne, no run slightly short on middle and off and it's pushed back towards the bowler
Kane Richardson to Thirimanne, no run pushed it a little fuller and it's played in the same region
Kane Richardson to Thirimanne, no run short of a good length on the off and it's tapped away into the off side
Kane Richardson to Thirimanne, no run bowled at 132.6kmph, slightly short and he's played it away towards point
Kane Richardson to Thirimanne, no run in the channel outside off stump, quicker at 136.2 kmph and it's been left alone to the keeper
Kane Richardson to Thirimanne, no run shortish on middle and a promising start for Richardson who begins his ODI career with a maiden over, defended on the pitch off the back foot
McKay to Dilshan, no run appeal for lbw but that would have missed leg I think, short of a good length on leg stump and it could well have been sliding down as he tried to work it
McKay to Dilshan, 1 run pushed just wide of mid-off off the front foot for a single to get a single
McKay to Thirimanne, FOUR runs ooh, yorker length outside off, tries to dig it out and he did so, but over Haddin's head, bump ball and over the keeper for a boundary
McKay to Thirimanne, no run goodish length outside off, nips away from a good length and he flirts with that one, misses
McKay to Thirimanne, no run
McKay to Thirimanne, no run pushed it full outside off and that's driven straight to mid-off
Kane Richardson to Dilshan, 1 leg bye short of a good length on middle, gets across to play it square, seems to strike him high on the pads, on the thigh infact, they get a single
Kane Richardson to Thirimanne, no run bowls that at 136.2 kmph, short of a good length and it's pushed off the back foot to point
Kane Richardson to Thirimanne, no run shortish on the off, gets on the back foot and stabs it to point
Kane Richardson to Thirimanne, no run pushed it full outside off and he goes for an expansive drive but misses
Kane Richardson to Thirimanne, no run shortish on the off, gets on the back foot and stabs it down into the off side
Kane Richardson to Thirimanne, no run pitches on a good length and he crunches that one towards cover off the front foot
McKay to Dilshan, no run short of a length outside off, goes for the cut does Dilshan but can't make contact, will feel he missed out there
McKay to Dilshan, 1 run slightly short on middle and leg and that's been turned down towards fine leg for a single
McKay to Thirimanne, no run goodish length outside off and that's been defended towards point
McKay to Thirimanne, no run short and wide and he goes for the cut, Thirimanne misses, again
McKay to Thirimanne, no run goodish length, gets front and across, bowled at 131.5kmph, defended towards mid-off
McKay to Thirimanne, no run pitched on a length this time, stylishly driven but straight to mid-off
Kane Richardson to Dilshan, 1 leg bye sliding on the pads is Richardson, at 134.9kmph, tried to flick it square, didn't connect, did with the pads though
Kane Richardson to Thirimanne, no run goes for it and misses again, bit of width from the bowler and he tries to smash that through extra cover, on the up, doesn't make contact
Kane Richardson to Thirimanne, no run short of a good length outside off and he plays it down towards point
Kane Richardson to Thirimanne, 2 runs inside edge, tries to drive it through extra cover, came back in just a hint, didn't miss the stumps by much, a couple more to fine leg
Kane Richardson to Thirimanne, 1 run slightly short outside off and he guides that one past point for a single
Kane Richardson to Dilshan, FOUR runs a touch too straight and Dilshan collects his first boundary, angling in towards middle and he drives it hard through mid-on and midwicket for a boundary
McKay to Thirimanne, no run short of a good length on middle, gets on the back foot and plays it to the bowler
McKay to Thirimanne, no run on middle and leg, gets across and drives it towards midwicket
McKay to Thirimanne, no run short of a good length and it's crunched off the back foot towards point
McKay to Thirimanne, no run on a good length, reaches forward and taps it down towards point

McKay to Thirimanne, FOUR runs over second slip, Hussey couldn't reach it, Thirimanne was getting frustrated, stepped out of the pitch and tried to smash that over extra cover, got a thick edge and it flew over the slips for a boundary
McKay to Thirimanne, no run gets across slightly and defends that one towards cover from the crease
Kane Richardson to Dilshan, no run pitched on a good length on middle, forces it into the leg side, mistimes it to midwicket
Kane Richardson to Dilshan, no run bowled at 135.4kmph, on the pads, missed opportunity he'll think, fullish and he tried to play the on-drive but was struck on the pads
Kane Richardson to Dilshan, no run bowled at 140.9kmph, short of a good length and he tried to crack that hard through the off side but didn't connect well enough
Kane Richardson to Dilshan, no run short of a good length on middle, gets forward and turns it towards midwicket
Kane Richardson to Dilshan, 1 leg bye slightly short on leg stump, tries to turn it down, think it clipped the pads on the way down to fine leg
Kane Richardson to Thirimanne, no run Thirimanne steps outside the line and pushes it down towards mid-on
Cutting to Dilshan, no run short of a good length on leg stump, tries to work it square does Dilshan, gets it high on the pads, bowled at 136.2 kmph
Cutting to Dilshan, 1 run good length on middle, gets front and across and turns the face, ends up being more of a thick inside edge towards fine leg
Cutting to Thirimanne, 1 run bowled at 137.1kmph, gets forward and pushes it wide of midwicket for a single
Cutting to Dilshan, 2 runs short of a good length on middle, works it square off the back foot for a well-run two
Cutting to Dilshan, no run pushed it full on the off and Dilshan drives that straight to mid-off, that was bowled at 139.3kmph

Cutting to Dilshan, 1 run run-out attempt, short of a good length on the off, pushed towards cover and rushes for the single, an attempt at the striker's end but Thirimanne dives and gets in, would have been close had that hit
McKay to Dilshan, no run pitched on a length and Dilshan goes at that one hard but can't time it well, straight to mid-off
McKay to Dilshan, 2 runs short of a good length on middle, gets on the back foot and turns it through square leg for a couple more runs
McKay to Dilshan, FOUR runs finally connects one properly, on the up, drives it hard and uppishly between cover and point, in the gap and four runs
McKay to Dilshan, no run shortish outside off, mistimes a cut this time, straight towards point
McKay to Dilshan, no run angling in towards off, rocks forward and defends it with a straight bat to the bowler
McKay to Dilshan, no run Dilshan's not timing them, pitched on a length and he had enough room there to try and blast that through cover, that's what he was trying to do but couldn't middle it
Cutting to Thirimanne, no run short of a good length on middle and off from Cutting, gets on the back foot and plays it to point
Cutting to Thirimanne, 1 run drops that one short outside leg stump and he clips it towards fine leg for a single
Cutting to Dilshan, no run short of a good length on middle, rocks back and defends him towards square leg
Cutting to Dilshan, 1 run shortish at 138.3kmph and it's pulled, along the ground, through to deep square leg for a single
Cutting to Thirimanne, no run short of a good length outside off, pushed off the back foot towards cover
Cutting to Thirimanne, no run good length on middle and off, drives it straight towards extra cover
McKay to Dilshan, no run shortish outside off, mistimes it towards point from the crease
McKay to Dilshan, 1 run on a good length, rocks forward and opens the face to guide that through to third man for a single
McKay to Thirimanne, no run bowls that in the channel outside off, a bit of away movement for McKay, that's been left alone to the keeper
McKay to Thirimanne, no run shortish on middle, rocks on the back foot and plays it towards midwicket
McKay to Thirimanne, no run pitched on a good length on middle, gets front and across and plays it to mid-off
McKay to Thirimanne, 1 run shortish outside off, runs that one down to third man for a single

Cutting to Thirimanne, FOUR runs superbly cut, was that out of frustration? Whatever it was, it came out right, short of a length on middle, created room by moving away and slashed it along the ground behind point
Cutting to Thirimanne, no run good comeback from Cutting, bowled at 140.2kmph, pushed it full, almost yorker length, defended into the leg side
Cutting to Thirimanne, 1 run goodish length on middle, gets front and across and chips that wide of midwicket for a single
Cutting to Dilshan, no run short of a good length on middle, rocks back and plays it back onto the pitch
Cutting to Dilshan, no run goodish length on the off and he pushes that towards cover
Cutting to Dilshan, no run goodish length again, opens the face and plays it towards point from the crease
Doherty to Thirimanne, 1 run pushes that one down towards long-on for a single
Doherty to Dilshan, 1 run tossed up on the off, drives that safely towards long-off for a single
Doherty to Thirimanne, 1 run plays that gently down to long-on for one more
Doherty to Dilshan, 1 run short of a good length, gets on the back foot and punches it towards long-off for a single
Doherty to Thirimanne, no run sent back, gets outside the line to that one and turns it towards midwicket
Doherty to Thirimanne, 1 run turns in from outside off, gets an inside edge as he tries to open the face, gets a single towards short fine
Cutting to Thirimanne, 2 runs upper-cut from Thirimanne, Cutting bowled that short, made a bit of room and guided it over slip for a couple of runs, third man went across to cut that off
Cutting to Thirimanne, no run short of a good length, gets on the front foot and pushes it to cover
Cutting to Thirimanne, no run short of a good length, covers the line and guides that one towards point
Cutting to Thirimanne, no run slightly short on middle, gets on the back foot and turns it towards midwicket from the crease
Cutting to Thirimanne, no run goodish length on the off, gets forward and drives it towards midwicket

Cutting to Thirimanne, FOUR runs a boundary that raises Sri Lanka's half-century, short of a length, made room to cut that and probably went much finer than he wanted, fetched him four though, third man is a little square
Doherty to Dilshan, 1 run shortish on the off, punched off the back foot towards long-off for a single
Doherty to Thirimanne, no run gets on the back foot and turns it into the leg side
Doherty to Thirimanne, no run tossed up outside off, steps outside the line and plays it back down the pitch
Doherty to Thirimanne, 1 run Thirimanne takes it from the off stump and paddles it in the vacant short-fine region for a single
Doherty to Dilshan, no run shortish outside off, the field has moved in on the off side, cut hard into the ground straight to point
Doherty to Dilshan, 2 runs flatter and quicker and that's cracked hard wide of deep extra cover for a couple of runs
Kane Richardson to Thirimanne, no run pitched up outside off and that was driven straight to extra cover
Kane Richardson to Thirimanne, no run beautifully driven, lovely crunching sound but straight to the extra cover fielder

Kane Richardson to Thirimanne, no run excellent fielding at cover by Smith, pitched up again from Richardson and that is cracked hard off the front foot but Smith dived to his left to stop that one and prevent some runs
Kane Richardson to Thirimanne, FOUR runs uppish, pitched up and he leaned forward and sliced that one between cover and point, opened the face but timed it well and in the gap
Kane Richardson to Thirimanne, 1 run good length this time from Richardson, Thirimanne gets across and turns it wide of midwicket for a single
Kane Richardson to Dilshan, 1 run slightly short on middle and Dilshan clips it behind square for a single
Doherty to Dilshan, no run angling in towards middle, gets forward and drops it into the off side
Doherty to Dilshan, 1 run shortish outside off, cut away towards deep point for a single

Doherty to Thirimanne, no run oh, dropped, got across to that quicker delivery from round the wicket, chipped it towards midwicket and Smith dived forward there, may have just got his hands under that one but couldn't hold on, jarred his finger there, a toughie
Doherty to Thirimanne, 1 run
Doherty to Dilshan, no run gets forward and pushes that one back down the pitch

Doherty to Dilshan, no run appeal for lbw, Dilshan is struck on the pads as he charged down the track to dispatch him over midwicket, missed, not given, Australia have asked for a review, pitches on leg and it hit the back leg as Dilshan missed, would that have gone on to hit the stumps? It went on straight. It's the umpire's call, says Eagle Eye, would just kisse
Smith to Thirimanne, no run tossed up outside off and he pushes it towards extra cover from the crease
Smith to Thirimanne, no run floating it on the off, gets across and turns it towards midwicket
Smith to Thirimanne, no run flighted on middle, comes down the track and drives it straight to midwicket
Smith to Thirimanne, no run the googly, shortish outside off, waits for it, taps it down to short third man
Smith to Thirimanne, 1 run flighted, much more air on this one, comes down the track and drives it to long-on for a single
Smith to Dilshan, no run floated it on the off stump, reaches forward and defends that one to cover
Doherty to Thirimanne, no run round the wicket to the left-hander, shortish on the off, gets on the front foot and plays it back
Doherty to Thirimanne, 1 run knocks that one down into the off side for a single
Doherty to Dilshan, no run pitched outside leg and he tried to sweep that square, lobbed off the pads
Doherty to Dilshan, no run pushes it straight towards extra cover
Doherty to Dilshan, no run short of a length outside off, cracked it towards point from the crease
Doherty to Dilshan, no run turned away from a good length on the off, beat him with the spin there, just goes past the outside edge
McKay to Thirimanne, 1 run nicely timed, pitched on a length outside off, cracks it wide of a diving point for a single
McKay to Dilshan, no run on a good length outside off, tries to crash that through extra cover but good timing has eluded him today
McKay to Dilshan, 1 run fullish outside off, chipped that one over extra cover for a single, again, not in full control
McKay to Thirimanne, no run
McKay to Thirimanne, no run pitched in the blockhole from McKay and it's been defended into the off side

McKay to Thirimanne, FOUR runs picked the slower one did Thirimanne, came down the track while simultaneously making some room, McKay had dragged it short, Thirimanne dispatched it over mid-on for a boundary
Doherty to Dilshan, 1 run waits for that to turn away, moves back and crunches it towards deep cover for a single
Doherty to Thirimanne, 1 run tossed up on middle, comes down the pitch and drives it to long-on for a single
Doherty to Dilshan, no run shortish outside off, cracks it off the back foot towards cover, can't beat the in-field
Doherty to Dilshan, 1 run shortish on the off, punched off the back foot past cover now for a single
Doherty to Thirimanne, 1 run comes down the track, takes it from a length and drives it to long-on for a single
Doherty to Dilshan, no run cut into the ground towards point from the crease
McKay to Thirimanne, 1 run dropped short by McKay, he rolls his wrists over that one and pulls it down to deep square leg for a single
McKay to Dilshan, FOUR runs drops that one short outside off and Dilshan drags it past midwicket, big gap behind that fielder and he finds the boundary
McKay to Dilshan, no run angling in towards middle, pushes it towards mid-on from the crease
McKay to Dilshan, no run goodish length and he drives that back to the bowler on the up
McKay to Dilshan, 1 run back of a length on middle, gets on the back foot and turns it into the leg side
McKay to Thirimanne, 1 run shortish on leg stump and that's tucked down towards fine leg for a single
Smith to Thirimanne, no run tosses it up outside off, comes down the track and plays it to extra cover
Smith to Thirimanne, no run flatter on the off stump, taps it away into the off side
Smith to Thirimanne, 2 runs tossed up, steps out and converts it into a full toss and drives it wide of deep extra cover for a couple of runs
Smith to Thirimanne, 1 run fifty for Thirimanne, driven down to long-on for a single, that's his fifth fifty in ODIs, started off slowly but is moving along well now
Smith to Dilshan, no run pitched up on the off and that's been driven hard but straight to extra cover
Smith to Dilshan, FOUR runs Dilshan picks up a boundary, that was flighted, he came down the track, got to the pitch and drilled it hard past the diving midwicket, mid-on is inside the circle
Cutting to Thirimanne, no run bowled at 135.2kmph, pitched full and he drives that straight to extra cover
Cutting to Thirimanne, 1 run falls safe, dropped short on middle, pulled but uppish and it lands safely in front of deep square leg, just the single
Cutting to Dilshan, no run driven on the up by Dilshan but can't get it past mid-off, short of a good length
Cutting to Dilshan, 1 run slightly short on the off, gets forward and tucks it into the leg side for a single
Cutting to Thirimanne, no run angling in towards the off stump from round the wicket, gets forward and pushes it to mid-on
Cutting to Thirimanne, 1 run dropped short on middle and he plays this one well, pulls it square but was in complete control of the shot, fine leg got to it in time and cut it off, just the single
Smith to Thirimanne, no run beaten through the gate, floated it up on a length outside off and got it to turn in just a hint, Thirimanne defended outside the line to that one and was beaten
Smith to Thirimanne, 1 run gets forward and knocks it into the leg side for a single
Smith to Dilshan, 1 run Dilshan comes down the track and heaves that through square leg for a single, mistimed
Smith to Thirimanne, 1 run takes it from a length and drives it down to long-on for a single
Smith to Dilshan, 1 run looped up on the off and he converts it into a low full toss to drive it to long-off for a single
Smith to Thirimanne, 1 run flighted on the off, drives it down to long-on for one more
Cutting to Thirimanne, no run bowled on a length outside off, gets forward and drives it towards cover

Cutting to Thirimanne, 2 runs a couple more to Thirimanne, short outside off and he guided it nicely over slip wide of third man, 100 up for Sri Lanka and that's also a century stand between these two
Cutting to Thirimanne, no run short of a good length, bowled at 140kmph, gets on the back foot and taps it to cover
Cutting to Thirimanne, 1 wide that one's down the leg side and is called a wide
Cutting to Thirimanne, no run goodish length on the off and he gets across to defend it to point
Cutting to Thirimanne, 1 run pitched on a length outside off and that's driven neatly wide of deep cover for a single
Cutting to Dilshan, 1 run angling in towards middle and he clips it wide of midwicket for a single
Smith to Dilshan, no run short outside off, turns away and he cuts it away to point
Smith to Dilshan, no run shortish on the off, punched it from the crease towards midwicket
Smith to Dilshan, no run on the pads and he tries to sweep it fine, struck on the pads as it turned in from outside leg
Smith to Dilshan, 1 run comes down the track,drives it towards long-off for a single
Smith to Thirimanne, 1 run shortish on middle and he drags it through square leg into the deep for a single
Smith to Dilshan, 1 run comes down the track and pushes it down towards long-off for a single
Cutting to Dilshan, no run
Cutting to Dilshan, 2 runs nicely driven, straight on middle and it's crunched past the bowler for a couple of runs
Cutting to Dilshan, no run nipped away from a good length outside off and Dilshan wasn't all too comfortable against that one
Cutting to Dilshan, 1 run low full toss on the off and he's dragged it through midwicket for a single
Cutting to Thirimanne, no run round the wicket and he drives that square towards point from the crease
Cutting to Thirimanne, FOUR runs too much width there from Cutting, short and wide and Thirimanne thrashes that to the point boundary, no chance there for third man
Maxwell to Dilshan, 1 run shortish outside off, chops that one behind point for a single
Maxwell to Thirimanne, 1 run tossed up on middle, comes down the track and pushes it past the bowler
Maxwell to Dilshan, 1 run short on the off, gets on the back foot and clips it past square leg
Maxwell to Thirimanne, 1 run good length outside off, stabbed wide of cover for a single
Maxwell to Dilshan, 1 run short outside off, cracked towards deep point for a single
Maxwell to Thirimanne, FOUR runs angling in towards middle, Thirimanne steps out and drives that nicely inside out over extra cover for a boundary, Sri Lanka are coasting now

Kane Richardson to Dilshan, no run that was close, driven straight back to the bowler, Thirimanne was backing up and Richardson got a hand to it as he tried to stop it on his follow through, didn't miss the stumps at the non-striker's end by much
Kane Richardson to Dilshan, no run short of a good length outside off, pushed towards point from the crease
Kane Richardson to Dilshan, 1 run gets forward and turns it wide of mid-on for a single, Dilshan gets to his half-century
Kane Richardson to Thirimanne, 1 run fullish outside off and that was sliced past point for a single
Kane Richardson to Dilshan, no run shortish outside off, tries to open the face there and guide it past slip, misses
Kane Richardson to Dilshan, no run bowled on a good length, pushes it back down the pitch to the bowler
Cutting to Thirimanne, no run short of a length on middle, gets on the back foot and plays it down in front of the bowler
Cutting to Thirimanne, FOUR runs he's been strong in that region today, short of a length and he made some room to cart that over point for a one bounce four
Cutting to Thirimanne, 1 run this time he guides that towards third man, was the slower one from Cutting
Cutting to Dilshan, no run short of a good length outside off, Dilshan has a swoosh and misses
Cutting to Dilshan, no run back of a length on the off and that's been tapped to point from the crease
Cutting to Dilshan, no run pitched on a length and it's driven through the line towards mid-off
McKay to Thirimanne, 1 run short of a good length on middle, turns it off the back foot behind square for a single
McKay to Dilshan, 1 run gets on the back foot and turns it through square leg for one more
McKay to Thirimanne, no run dropped it short on middle and kept it down did Thirimanne, playing it down to square leg
McKay to Thirimanne, FOUR runs bad ball from McKay, short ball down the leg side and Thirimanne helps it on its way to the fine-leg boundary, Doherty can't stop that
McKay to Thirimanne, no run bowls that one short outside off and he lets it through this time

McKay to Thirimanne, 2 runs bowls that one short outside off, crunches it off the back foot past point, they scramble back for the second but would have been interesting had that hit direct from the deep, Thirimanne was really trying hard to make it back
Cutting to Dilshan, no run goodish length on the off and he gets forward to tap it into the leg side
Cutting to Dilshan, no run short of a length outside off, crunched it into the ground towards point
Cutting to Dilshan, no run good length on the off, gets front and across and pushes it straight to midwicket
Cutting to Perera, 1 run goodish length and he is off the mark immediately, pushes it past point for a single
Cutting to Thirimanne, 1 run thick outside edge from Thirimanne as he pushes at one outside off, well wide of slip for a single
McKay to Thirimanne, no run short of a good length on the off, gets forward and taps it towards cover
McKay to Thirimanne, 2 runs Thirimanne swings across the line, fetches that from just outside off and drags it uppishly between midwicket and mid-on for a couple of runs

McKay to Thirimanne, no run appeal for lbw, there were two noises, there may have been an inside edge, Australia are not going for a review, they can't because they don't have one left, nips back in from a good length, Hot Spot though didn't capture anything, may have hit both pads, ooh, close
McKay to Thirimanne, no run stifled appeal for a catch, missed the bat, went off the thigh as he tried to turn that fine, good take by Hughes jumping to his right
McKay to Thirimanne, 1 run short on middle and he did a good job keeping it down, playing it down towards deep square leg for a single
McKay to Perera, no run short of a good length and it nips away to just go past the outside edge as he pushes off the back foot
Cutting to Thirimanne, no run around a good length, trying to knock it down into the off side, gets a thick inside edge towards square leg
Cutting to Thirimanne, no run sliding on the pads, gets on the back foot to play it to square leg, is struck high on the pads
Cutting to Thirimanne, 2 runs beautifully driven down the ground, pitched on a length on middle and he offers a straight bat, past mid-on and mid-off for a couple of runs
Cutting to Thirimanne, no run beaten, pushing at a tempting delivery outside off, a little inside the line there, was beaten
Cutting to Thirimanne, no run pitched up on the off, drives it towards mid-off off the front foot
Cutting to Thirimanne, no run beaten there, got it to angle in and then nip away, beat the outside edge
Maxwell to Perera, 1 run a low full toss, driven down to long-off for a single
Maxwell to Thirimanne, no run fullish on middle and off and it's defended into the off side
Maxwell to Thirimanne, no run tossed up on middle and it's driven back to the bowler down the pitch
Maxwell to Thirimanne, no run angling it on middle and it's defended watchfully towards cover
Maxwell to Thirimanne, 1 run made a bit of room, dropped it in front of point for a quick single
Maxwell to Perera, no run stabbed that spinning delivery from the crease towards point
Doherty to Thirimanne, 1 run round the wicket, short outside off, crunched past point for a single
Doherty to Perera, no run on a length, reaches forward and defends that into the off side
Doherty to Perera, SIX runs hard and flat, that's a six, on a length and he swings it hard over the deep square leg boundary, Kane Richardson is a tall man but he couldn't reach it
Doherty to Perera, FOUR runs pitched up outside off, plenty of width and Perera crashes that through extra cover for four more
Doherty to Perera, 1 run slightly short on middle, turns it into the leg side for a single
Doherty to Thirimanne, 1 run slightly short on the off, turns it behind square for a single to keep strike
Maxwell to Thirimanne, 1 run tossed up on the off, drives it down the ground to long-off and he takes single
Maxwell to Perera, no run flighted on middle and it's pushed straight to mid-on
Maxwell to Perera, 1 run turns it towards short fine leg for a single
Maxwell to Thirimanne, 1 wide fires that one down the leg side and it's a wide
Maxwell to Thirimanne, 1 run comes down the pitch and takes a single by pushing that towards cover
Maxwell to Perera, no run an inside edge on the pads for Perera, rolls down towards short fine
Maxwell to Perera, no run drives that one straight back to the bowler, Thirimanne still stands a chance
Doherty to Thirimanne, FOUR runs Thirimanne takes a chance and gets a boundary, that was tossed up and he came down, got to the pitch and swung it into that gap between long-on and deep midwicket
Doherty to Thirimanne, 1 run takes a single, drives it wide of midwicket, a fumble and they have to take a single
Doherty to Perera, no run gets forward and outside the line and he defends
Doherty to Perera, no run quicker through the air, on the off stump and he defends it on the pitch
Doherty to Perera, no run shortish on middle and it's played towards midwicket
Doherty to Perera, no run slightly short, turns in, he calmly defends it towards silly point

Maxwell to Thirimanne, FOUR runs Reaches his century and scores the inning runs as well, short and he makes room to cut that past point to complete the formalities, it's his first List A century, he's relieved, takes off his helmet, acknowledges the applause and then shakes hands with the hosts, the series is level 1-1

A comfortable win for Sri Lanka, each team dominating a game this series. The bowlers first did the job, and Dilshan and Thirimanne ensured there were no major hiccups in the chase of 171. Daniel Brettig's report should be ready soon. We don't have any coverage of the presentation. Thanks for tuning in and sending us your feedback, and we'll be back with you for the thir
Sri Lanka won by 8 wickets (with 59 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Lahiru Thirimanne, SL
